attributes.action: All football should be on free-to-air TV
attributes.additional_details:
Football is our national sport and only a small minority can actually view this great game on TV. Millions of football fans are missing out each week on watching these matches which we think is unfair. The following tournaments should be taken off Sky Sports and ESPN and should only be shown on free to air TV.

Premier League,
Champions League,
FA Cup,
Carling Cup,
Europa League,
England Internationals
